name: Stonetowers
description: Build and defend your burgeoning settlement in this town-building tower-defence hybrid. Guide your people as they unlock the secrets of the arcane and protect their new home from the otherworldly beings that surround it.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista or above Processor: Modern dual-core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 270 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Modern quad-core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 280 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
